dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT BL_NUMBER BL_NUM, BOOKING_DATE, (CASE WHEN (SELECT sref.shipment_refnum_value FROM shipment_refnum sref WHERE sref.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.INVOICE NUMBER') IS NULL THEN vss.shipment_xid ELSE (SELECT sref.shipment_refnum_value FROM shipment_refnum sref WHERE sref.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.INVOICE NUMBER') END) SHIPMENT_NUMBER, DRAFTS_AT, TOTAL_NUMONLY, TOTAL_TEXT, CREDIT_NUMBER, CREDIT_DATE, OPENING_BANK, OPENING_BANK_ADDRESS, DRAWEE, DRAWEE_ADDRESS FROM VIEW_SHIPMENT_SUMMARY vss WHERE VSS.SHIPMENT_GID = :SHIPMENT_ID AND :P_RUN = 'FINAL' UNION SELECT NVL(BL_NUMBER, 'Data Missing in System') BL_NUM, NVL(BOOKING_DATE, 'Data Missing in System') BOOKING_DATE, NVL((CASE WHEN (SELECT sref.shipment_refnum_value FROM shipment_refnum sref WHERE sref.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.INVOICE NUMBER') IS NULL THEN vss.shipment_xid ELSE (SELECT sref.shipment_refnum_value FROM shipment_refnum sref WHERE sref.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.INVOICE NUMBER') END), 'Data Missing in System') SHIPMENT_NUMBER, NVL(DRAFTS_AT, 'Data Missing in System') DRAFTS_AT, NVL(TOTAL_NUMONLY, 'Data Missing in System') TOTAL_NUMONLY, NVL(TOTAL_TEXT, 'Data Missing in System') TOTAL_TEXT, NVL(CREDIT_NUMBER, 'Data Missing in System') CREDIT_NUMBER, NVL(CREDIT_DATE, 'Data Missing in System') CREDIT_DATE, NVL(OPENING_BANK, 'Data Missing in System') OPENING_BANK, NVL(OPENING_BANK_ADDRESS, 'Data Missing in System') OPENING_BANK_ADDRESS, NVL(DRAWEE, 'Data Missing in System') DRAWEE, NVL(DRAWEE_ADDRESS, 'Data Missing in System') DRAWEE_ADDRESS FROM VIEW_SHIPMENT_SUMMARY vss WHERE VSS.SHIPMENT_GID = :SHIPMENT_ID AND :P_RUN = 'DRAFT'
